item.title: Android apps run full screen on Honeycomb Tablets
item.description: Google recently announced some exciting new features for Android 3.0 Honeycomb. Most notably, Android 3.0 sees tablets and mobile devices merge to the same code base. This is kind of like having one OS for all devices. There are interface design considerations that need to be understood before launching your app on the big screen. Android Apps run full screen - Interface Design The key point to note is that Android apps run in full screen on tablets.
